tasks.task: Drive farm truck from field to storage area
subtasks: Insert key into ignition
Turn key to start engine
Observe rearview mirror while backing up
Align truck with trailer or area for loading
Engage clutch or transmission for smooth stopping
Stop truck to open trailer doors or gates
Close trailer doors or gates after loading
Start up the tractor
Guide the tractor through rows
Attach or detach implements to the tractor
Adjust settings on the implement for optimal performance
Maneuver around obstacles or uneven terrain
Turn the steering wheel to direct the tractor
Use foot pedals to control speed and direction
Shift gears while moving to maintain efficiency
Stop the tractor and disengage implements when done
Detach implement from tractor
Align crop with truck bed
Secure crop in place using straps or tie-downs
Ensure weight distribution is even
Cover crops with tarp if necessary
Position truck under storage structure
Lower ramps or unload manually
Organize crops within storage area
Mark or tag crops for tracking purposes

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer or chemical treatment to crops
subtasks: Enter field with sprayer
Mix chemicals in tank
Monitor pressure levels and flow rate
Operate boom or spray arm
Drive in straight lines or specific patterns
Adjust spray settings for different crops or conditions
Refill tanks as needed during application
Set up planter machinery
Load seed into hopper
Drive machinery through designated rows
Adjust depth and spacing of seeds
Monitor planting progress and troubleshoot any issues

tasks.task: Harvest ripe crops using combine harvester
subtasks: Assemble combine and travel to field
Start combine engine
Drive combine through rows, operating controls
Adjust combine settings for different crops or weather
Separate grain from chaff and debris
Load grain onto transport vehicle
Clean and maintain combine after use

tasks.task: Store harvested crops in silo or barn
subtasks: Hoist loaded grain into silo using auger
Monitor grain levels and temperature
Protect grain from moisture and pests
Organize stored crops for easy access
Inspect tractors, trucks, and other vehicles for damage
Replace worn parts or perform maintenance
Clean and lubricate machinery as needed
Store equipment properly to prevent corrosion
Check fluid levels (oil, coolant, etc.)
Tighten bolts and adjust settings
Test machines before and after use
Assemble tiller or mulcher machinery
Drive over designated areas, adjusting depth and pass
Check soil conditions and adjust settings accordingly
Spread mulch over soil, if applicable
Compact soil with roller, if necessary

tasks.task: Manage livestock (assuming the original context was cattle herding)
subtasks: Gather cattle from pasture to corral
Herd cattle with鞭 (possible mistranslation or misunderstanding original intent)
Drive cattle with shepherd's crook or鞭 (translated as '鞭', but depending on terminology)
Use voice commands or signals to direct cattle
Watch for stragglers or injured animals
Attend to livestock needs (shelter, water, food)

tasks.task: Drive farm truck from field to storage area
